Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Villa de Adeje Beach in Adeje (Costa Adeje), you'll be minutes from Aqualand Costa Adeje and close to Los Cristianos Beach. This hotel is within close proximity of Puerto Colon and Bobo Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 120 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and separate sitting areas.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities including a sauna and a fitness center. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance. Spending a day of fun is easy with the complimentary theme park shuttle.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Villa de Adeje Beach. Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held daily. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour front desk, and laundry facilities.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Villa de Adeje Beach. Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held daily. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Hotel Villa de Adeje Beach in Adeje (Costa Adeje), you'll be minutes from Aqualand Costa Adeje and close to Los Cristianos Beach. This hotel is within close proximity of Puerto Colon and Bobo Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Aqualand Costa Adeje - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Puerto Colon - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Bobo Beach - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Gran Sur Shopping Center - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Torviscas Beach - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Siam Park - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Magma Art and Congress Centre - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Troya Beach - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Del Duque Beach - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Veronicas Strip - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Golf Las Americas - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Arona Pyramid - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Las Vistas Beach - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Los Cristianos Beach - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Golf Costa Adeje - 4 km / 2.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Villa de Adeje Beach is Tenerife (TFS-Tenerife South) - 15.4 km / 9.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
